name: Daily Bible Verse
author: Bibleverses.net

sections.description:
There are 31,102 Bible Verses. This plugin allows you to add a Bible Verse of the Day widget to your WordPress page. After carefully curating a complete catalog of verses from the Bible we are excited to share with you and your websites visitors!

Every day the bible verse will change automatically. You can choose from 3 different modes: text, text+image or image only mode.

Bibleverses seeks to bring clarity and understanding to the often quoted verses of the Bible. We realize that not everyone is Bible Scholar and many people have seen popular verses quoted on social media, blogs, t-shirts and numerous other formats without never really knowing what the verse actually says. We hope this plugin will inspire and educate your audience!

If the connection to the Bibleverses API fails for some reason, the plugin will show John 3:16 automatically. Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions.

Features

  • Widget allows you to place a Bible Verse of the Day sidebar on your page
  • Widget adapts to the theme of your page
  • Plugin allows you to place multiple widgets on your page

For more information

To learn more about the plugin, visit our Daily Bible Verse WordPress Plugin page.
sections.installation:
INSTALL DAILY BIBLE VERSE FROM WITHIN WORDPRESS

  1. Visit the plugins page within your dashboard and select ‘Add New’
  2. Search for ‘Daily Bible Verse’
  3. Activate Daily Bible Verse from your Plugins page
  4. Go to ‘after activation’ below

INSTALL DAILY BIBLE VERSE MANUALLY

  1. Upload the ‘daily-bible-verse’ folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Go to the Plugins page and activate the plugin.
